definition: to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

pinyin: ke1 ji4 jing1 song3 xiao3 shuo1

sentences.english: This story is a sort of a thriller, which is quite unusual for Slovene films.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个对斯洛文尼亚电影来说很不寻常的惊悚故事。

sentences.english: Expect another tightly plotted film from Hong Kong's master of stylish thrillers.
sentences.chinese: 期待香港这位惊悚片大师又一部扣人心弦的力作吧。

sentences.english: It is a first-person horror game, heavily focused on puzzle solving.
sentences.chinese: 这是一款第一人称惊悚游戏，严重专注于解谜要素。

sentences.english: Of course, nothing can be that easy in an action-adventure thriller.
sentences.chinese: 当然，在一部动作冒险惊悚片中，事情没有那么简单。

sentences.english: Salt is an American action thriller film.
sentences.chinese: 电影《特工绍特》是今年一部好莱坞动作惊悚大片。

sentences.english: What made you want to write vampire-themed horror novels?
sentences.chinese: 是什么促使你写这本吸血鬼题材的惊悚小说的？

sentences.english: I'm currently rewriting a girls’ horror series I wrote long ago.
sentences.chinese: 我目前在重写很早以前打稿的一个少女惊悚系列。

sentences.english: It is a sensational text, this case of Florie.
sentences.chinese: 佛洛瑞的这个病例，是一个很令人惊悚的文本。

sentences.english: The science-fiction thriller starts in a state of glorious disorientation.
sentences.chinese: 在科幻惊悚片在一个辉煌的开始迷失方向的状态。

sentences.english: Akkad also produced the popular Halloween horror film series.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡德还制作了深受欢迎的万圣节系列惊悚影片。

sentences.english: Knightley added a bit of variety into her credit list with this psychological thriller.
sentences.chinese: 奈特莉通过这部心里惊悚片丰富了她的作品的多样性。

sentences.english: The genre is closely linked with the thriller and adventure film genres.
sentences.chinese: 这种类型是与惊悚片和冒险电影类紧密联系在一起的。

sentences.english: Sci-fi thriller Inception picked up the Cinematography award.
sentences.chinese: 科幻惊悚片《盗梦空间》获得了最佳摄影奖。

sentences.english: With the storm has come of a sudden our king of the fearful night.
sentences.chinese: 在这惊悚之夜，国王与暴风雨一道俄然光降。

sentences.english: This is more preposterous and shocking than when Wombwell's lions came and the little child's arm was bit clean off!
sentences.chinese: 这比上次狮子跑出来啃掉小孩整只胳膊还要惊悚百倍。

definition: to have one's hair stand on end (idiom)/to feel one's blood run cold
science fiction/abbr. for 科學幻想|科学幻想[ke1 xue2 huan4 xiang3]
shiver all over though not cold/tremble with fear/shudder
to hunt for novelty/to seek novelty
